Visitor Poll:

"Would Puriton benefit from having a skatepark?"


Events





Welcome to Puriton in Somerset

 

Please note that the Parish Council meetings are now held on the second Tuesday of each month at Puriton Village Hall at 7.45 pm. 

Remember to keep yourself informed - check the Latest News 

Welcome to the website of Puriton Parish Council.

By clicking on the menus at the top of the page you can find your way around this website and learn more about the village. 

We hope that this website will prove useful to those seeking information about the village and the functions and services provided by the Parish Council. Additionally we hope the website will allow users to communicate with the Council. We value your feedback and will always use it to inform our work for the benefit of the community. 

Should you wish to contact the council please direct your enquiries to the parish clerk, Sally Diaz.

email: clerk@puritonparishcouncil.gov.uk

phone: 01934 221659

The parish clerk works part-time hours, so if you are unable to make initial phone contact please leave a message and Sally will return your call.

Photographs courtesy of Beverley Stanley (Somerset view), Tim Salter (Puriton crops), Sam Winter (blue skies over the Poldens) and Laurence Douglas-Greene, LDG Photography (ROF railway).

<div class="content">


<div class="contentright">

<p><span style="font-family: "trebuchet ms", helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;">2019 is set to be an exciting year for Seaford and the Town Council with some inspiring projects in the pipeline. Work on the state-of-the-art skatepark (part of The Salts Development Plan) is due to start in the spring and two outdoor table tennis tables will be installed; six brightly painted, rental beach huts will be appearing on the promenade, together with new art and craft concession huts; water bottle refill stations will be located at Bönningstedt Promenade, Frankie's Beach Café and The Salts, and, subject to Council approval, there will be a new spike bar at The View, to highlight a few. </span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">The Council issues regular press releases regarding its activities (which can be accessed from the <a href="/News.aspx">News</a><a href="/Press-Releases.aspx"> page</a>) and a wealth of information can be found on this website. Also available are current updates on ongoing issues within the town, including <a href="/Grass-Verge-Cutting-June-2018.aspx">Grass Verge Cutting</a> and <a href="/Motorhomes-on-the-Seafront-June-2018.aspx">Motorhomes on the Seafront</a>.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">Work on the Seaford Town Neighbourhood Plan continues; find the most recent update on the <a href="/Neighbourhood-Plan.aspx">Neighbourhood Plan page</a>.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">Minutes and agendas from Council meetings and those of the Council's Committees can be found on the <a href="/Minutes-amp3b-Agendas.aspx">Minutes & Agendas page </a>or alternatively, the videos of the meetings are uploaded and available to watch on the <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjAYAaMKgdv8ckENO9NsSjA">Council's YouTube channel</a>.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">The Council always welcomes feedback or questions on its activities and services; please use the 'Ask Question' link to the right. </span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">The <a href="/Privacy-Notices.aspx">Council's Privacy Notice</a> can be found online, as can our '<a href="/Communication-Opt-In.aspx">Communication Opt-In</a>' to receive updates direct to your email inbox.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="/Beach-Huts.aspx"><img alt="" src="https://www.intouchcrm.co.uk/app/cms/imagelibrary/files/InTouch/20932/20932_thumblarge.jpg" style="width: 590px; height: 227px;" /></a><span style="font-family: "trebuchet ms", helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;"> </span><span style="font-family: "trebuchet ms", helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;"> </span></p>

<div>
<div>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">In March of each year, residents receive their Council Tax demands from Lewes District Council, setting out the payments due to service providing local authorities, namely; East Sussex County Council, Lewes District Council, Seaford Town Council, the Police & Crime Commission and East Sussex Fire Authority. The leaflet below has been created to help identify exactly what the Council Tax payments to the Town Council are being put towards, what the Council has achieved for the town and is planning for the coming year.</span></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;"><a href="/controls/DownloadDocument.ashx?docID=xi8647CHJZUTWHJVKY3706lEal&aID=2294"><img alt="" src="https://www.intouchcrm.co.uk/app/cms/imagelibrary/files/InTouch/19524/19524_thumblarge.jpg" style="width: 250px; height: 358px;" /></a></span></span></p>

<p><span style="font-size:16px;"><span style="font-family:trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif;">The 2019 Town Guide, which provides invaluable information for residents and visitors, is now available to download by clicking on the image below. Residents and businesses in the BN25 1, 2, 3 and 4 postcode areas will shortly receive a hard copy delivered by the Royal Mail. </span></span></p>
<a href="http://www.localauthoritypublishing.co.uk/flip_guides/seaford3772x/index.html"><img alt="" src="https://www.intouchcrm.co.uk/app/cms/imagelibrary/files/InTouch/22278/22278_thumblarge.jpg" style="width: 251px; height: 354px;" /></a><br />
<img alt="" src="https://www.intouchcrm.co.uk/app/cms/imagelibrary/files/InTouch/18585/18585_thumblarge.jpg" style="text-align: justify; width: 190px; height: 142px; float: left;" />
<div><img alt="" src="https://www.intouchcrm.co.uk/app/cms/imagelibrary/files/InTouch/10091/10091_thumblarge.jpg" style="text-align: justify; width: 189px; height: 142px; float: left;" /></div>

</div>
